diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+# Copyright 2016 The TensorFlow Authors. All Rights Reserved.
+#
body:
The `_CMAKE_VAR_REGEX` for parsing isl source files is not the same as the one for LLVM.

```
$ diff expand_cmake_vars.py expand_isl_cmake_vars.py
27c27
< _CMAKE_VAR_REGEX = re.compile(r"\${([A-Za-z_0-9]*)}")
---
> _CMAKE_VAR_REGEX = re.compile(r"@([A-Za-z_0-9]*)@")
```
body_html:
